name: Money Clicker (DewCraft)
description:
How to play:

 You will start off with no money. You will progress later on in the game, but your first goal is to keep pressing the button saying "CLICK HERE" eventually you will have enough cash to be able to upgrade and get even morer cash per click. When you have enough cash you have the option to buy a autoclicker. But the goal really is to get as rich as possible!
